Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1.create a report
2.set some rows's visibility property to false
3.call the report from web browser
4.click the "export report" button
5.choose the "xls" format and click "ok" 
6.report "null exception" on the console

I have downloaded the birt-runtime-2.2.1-N20070913,and test this attachment on this version.
However I found the rows that set to be hided is shown as the other rows which is not set to be hided.

We donot have you data, so we cannot reproduce this bug.
there is some bug related to visibility fixed yesterday, so i suggest you download birt-runtime-2.2.1-N20070914, and have a test again.

if there is any problem in the result of 20070914, please let me know.
it better for us to have screenshots of your bugs, please attach it.

Thanks.

XLS doesn't support line-break in a single cell, so the two-line item create
two rows in HTML.

One solution is to replace the line-break with white-space, so in HTML if the
cell is too small to contains the whole item, the item will be split into two
lines at the position of white-space while in XLS it is still one line.

A new bug (203574) is submitted as the row-span is not correct in the generated
XLS.
